summary: 25 MILES SOUTH OF MIRANDO CITY, TEXAS. TRACTOR TOWING THE MODERN GROUP / DRAGON INDUSTRIES SN: 29134 WAS TRAVELING EAST ON STATE HIGHWAY 16. FORD F150 WITH TOWED UTILITY TRAILER WAS TRAVELING WEST ON STATE  HIGHWAY 16. TRACTOR TRAILER FAILED TO YIELD THERE RIGHT OF WAY WHEN TURNING LEFT ONTO FARM ROAD 649. THIS CAUSED THE F150 TO STRIKE THE MODERN GROUP / DRAGON INDUSTRIES TANKER TRAILER ON THE RIGHT SIDE WITH THE F150'S FRONT. THE F150 BECAME WEDGED UNDER THE MODERN GROUP / DRAGON INDUSTRIES TRAILER. THE PASSENGER WAS FATALLY WOUNDED AND THE DRIVER SUFFERED TWO BROKEN LEGS. THE TRACTOR TRAILER CAME TO REST FACING NORTH ON FARM ROAD 649. THE F150 WITH TOWED UTILITY TRAILER CAME TO REST FACING WEST ON STATE HIGHWAY 16.  *TR
